Text.Page:
Others say orcans are stupid, single-minded, or reckless. It's not true!

We eat red dogbane to make us stronger, braverâ€”but it hurts our minds, too.

If you brought me some of the flowers, maybe I could find a way to make us better!
Maybe this work helps my people work together with your people.
Must have the red dogbane! Need to find cure.
